name: NSScrubberFlowLayoutDelegate
desc: A protocol that a scrubber delegate can adopt to provide the size of an item.

items.name: func scrubber(NSScrubber, layout: NSScrubberFlowLayout, sizeForItemAt: Int) -> NSSize
items.desc: Asks the delegate for the size of each item in a scrubber whose items are arranged in a flow layout.
